snippet: If Hillary Rodham Clinton can cut through the cacophony of voices offering advice, she can learn much from the failures of her previous campaign.

byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: If Hillary Rodham Clinton can cut through the cacophony of voices offering advice, she can learn much from the failures of her previous campaign.

headline.main: Lessons for Hillary Clinton on Another Run
headline.print_headline: Lessons for Clinton on Another Run
